## Sweet Squash 

<span class="mh">Ingredients:</span>  
<div class="my2cols">
<ul>
  <li>1 delicata squash, cut into thin slices</li>
  <li>2-4 TBSP Maple syrup</li>
  <li>2-4 TBSP Vegan butter </li>
  <li>Salt</li>
  <br><br>
</ul>
</div>
<br>
<span class="mh">Directions:</span> 
<div class="my2cols">
<ol>
  <li>Set oven at 400 degrees </li>
  <li>Coat each piece of squash in a mixture of butter and maple syrup</li>
  <li>Place pieces spread out on a baking sheet (with parchment paper)</li>
  <li>Sprinkle a little salt on the top</li>
  <li>Bake for 25-35 min (until fork soft); flipping the pieces about halfway through</li> 
</ol>
</div>
